title: At Kherson direction Russian army shelled Kherson city and Khreschenivka, Dudchany, Beryslav, Stanislav of Kherson region, - ...
content: At Kherson direction Russian army shelled Kherson city and Khreschenivka, Dudchany, Beryslav, Stanislav of Kherson region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report
author: Live UA Map
